question.content: From this passage, we know a woman in Ameriaca has ___ skin.

question.choice: Because she eats so many potatoes.
Because She eats so much meat.
Because she eats so many bananas.
Because she eats too many tomatoes, carrots and squashes.

question.content: What does the doctor tell the woman to do?
question.choice: The doctor tells the woman to eat more sugar.
The doctor tells the woman to drink more water.
The doctor tells the woman to eat some green things.
The doctor tells the woman to eat more rice.
